name: 7 IS DEAD
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Mouse only : 

  • Left click
    • to zoom on peoples
    • at the top of the screen to open your cards panel
    • on the right and left of the screen to navigate
  • Right click to go back
  • Drag & drop cards
    • on people for questioning them
    • on your panel to manage clues
